name: CMS Page
description: The cms page (also Smart Table) feature has been removed. Use html dialog to implement user interfaces.

name: Macros in RTF documents
description: Macro expansion in RTF documents has been removed. Use the doc factory to generate documents.

name: Import Ivy 3.9 Project
description: The 3.9 project importer has been removed. Import 3.9 with e.g. Axon Ivy Designer 5.0 and then use the latest Designer to migrate to the latest version.

name: RIA / Rich Dialog
description: The rich dialog technology stack has been removed. Use html dialog to implement user interfaces.

name: WebService Axis 1 & 2
description: The Axis web service client technology stack has been removed. Use the brand new CXF web service client stack.

name: Java Library - Guava
description: The Java library Guava is provided currently on the ivy project classpath. It will be removed in future. Use the utilities from the JDK.

name: Java Library - Apache Commons Lang 2
description: The Java library Apache Commons Lang 2 is provided currently on the ivy project classpath. It will be removed in future. Use Apache Commons Lang 3 which is provided on the ivy project classpath.

name: Java Library - Apache Commons Collection 3
description: The Java library Apache Commons Collection 3 is provided currently on the ivy project classpath. It will be removed in future. Use Apache Commons Collection 4 which is provided on the ivy project classpath.

name: Java Library - Apache HTTP Client
description: The Java library Apache Http Client is provided currently on the ivy project classpath. It will be removed in future. Use the HTTP Client from the JDK.

name: Environments
description: Environments are deprecated and we won't invest in new features. Please use containers or correct configurations instead.

name: Process Documentation (BIRT)
description: The Process Reporting extension tool BIRT is removed.

name: Tomcat AJP Protocol
description: The AJP Protocol is deprecated. Please use the HTTP or HTTPS Protocol instead.

name: Overriding (Case Scope)
description: The Case Scope Overriding is deprecated in favor of Strict Overriding.

name: CMS Meta Data
description: There was a .meta file for each CMS entry. This file is completely removed in favor of a modern CMS structure.

name: Call & Wait element
description: The Call & Wait intermediate process element.

name: Dynamic HTML Dialog id
description: Dynamic HTML Dialog id from a data class attribute.
